# This file is controlled by Puppet

passwd:     files
shadow:     files
group:      files
hosts:      files mdns4_minimal [NOTFOUND=return] dns
bootparams: nisplus [NOTFOUND=return] files
ethers:     files
netmasks:   files
networks:   files
protocols:  files
rpc:        files
services:   files
netgroup:   nisplus
publickey:  nisplus
automount:  files nisplus
aliases:    files nisplus
